titles.title: Making in order, in the consideration by the House of Representatives of H.R. 3600 (the "Health Security Act"), an amendment-in-the-nature-of-a-substitute consisting of the text of H.R. 3080 and including a title providing for assistance for the purpose of health insurance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 8/4/1994--Introduced. Makes in order, in the consideration of H.R. 3600 (Health Security Act), an amendment substituting the text of H.R. 3080 and including a title providing for assistance for the purpose of health insurance.
